tit.j: ガルトネル開墾条約事件
tit.cmt: I could not find the correct spelling of ガルトネル
Gaertner Cultivation Treaty Incident に訂正しました。

sen.j: ガルトネル開墾条約事件（がるとねるかいこんじょうやくじけん）あるいはガルトネル事件（がるとねるじけん）とは、明治初年に、七飯町の開墾地をめぐって発生した外交事件である。
sen.e: Case of Garutoneru cultivation treaty or the case of Garutoneru is a diplomatic incident that occurred over the cultivated land in Nanae Town in the first year of Meiji period.
Gaertner Cultivation Treaty Incident or Gaertner Incident is a diplomatic incident that occurred over the cultivated land in Nanae Town in the first year of Meiji period.
sen.cmt: Gaertner Cultivation Treaty Incident に訂正しました。
sen.e: Gaertner Cultivation Treaty Incident or Gaertner Incident is a diplomatic incident that occurred over the cultivated land in Nanae Town in the first year of Meiji period.
Outline
Outline
Outline

sen.j: プロシアの貿易商R.ガルトネルは、幕末より七飯で開墾事業を行っていた。
sen.e: The Prussian trader, Garutoneru had been engaged in cultivation business in Nanae town since the last days of Edo period.
The Prussian trader, Gaertner had been engaged in cultivation business in Nanae town since the last days of Edo period.
The Prussian trader, Gaertner had been engaged in cultivation business in Nanae town since the last days of Edo period.

sen.j: 1868年に蝦夷共和国が箱館を占領し、1869年ガルトネルは蝦夷島政府との間で99年間の貸借契約を締結した。
sen.e: In 1868, the Ezo Republic occupied Hakodate and in 1869, a 99-year lease was signed between Garutoneru and the Ezo Island government.
In 1868, the Ezo Republic occupied Hakodate and in 1869, a 99-year lease was signed between Gaertner and the Ezo Island government.
In 1868, the Ezo Republic occupied Hakodate and in 1869, a 99-year lease was signed between Gaertner and the Ezo Island government.

sen.j: 同年、箱館戦争終結後、箱館府がこの契約を引き継いだが、翌1870年にガルトネルに対して賠償金を支払うことで契約を解除した。
sen.e: Later that year, in the aftermath of the Battle of Hakodate, the contract was taken over by the Hakodate government, which terminated the contract by paying a penalty fine to Garutoneru in 1870.
Later that year, in the aftermath of the Battle of Hakodate, the contract was taken over by the Hakodate government, which terminated the contract by paying a penalty fine to Gaertner in 1870.
Later that year, in the aftermath of the Battle of Hakodate, the contract was taken over by the Hakodate government, which terminated the contract by paying a penalty fine to Gaertner in 1870.
Current Situation
Current Situation
Current Situation
(as of 2008)
(as of 2008)
(as of 2008)

sen.j: 七飯町は自町を「西洋農業発祥の地」としている。
sen.e: Nanae town regards itself as "the birthplace of western agriculture".
Nanae town regards itself as "the birthplace of western agriculture".
Nanae town regards itself as 'the birthplace of western agriculture.'

sen.j: 開墾地に植林したブナ林は「ガルトネル・ブナ林」と呼ばれている。
sen.e: The beech forest planted in the cultivated land is called "Garutoneru Beech Forest".
The forest of beech trees planted in the cultivated land is called "Gaertner Beech Forest".
sen.cmt: Gaertner に訂正しました。 forest of beech trees planted に訂正しました。
sen.e: The forest of beech trees planted in the cultivated land is called 'Gaertner Beech Forest.'
